Name: Ouagadougou
Description: Ouagadougou (pronounced: WA-ga-DOO-goo) is the capital of Burkina Faso and the nation's cultural & economic centre. Its name is informally shortened to Ouaga (pronounced: WA-ga).

Name: Banfora
Description: Banfora is a city in Burkina Faso

Name: Bobo-Dioulasso
Description: With a population of more than half a million, Bobo-Dioulasso is the second largest city in Burkina Faso.

Description: Dedougou is a city in Burkina Faso.

Name: Gaoua
Description: Gaoua is a market town in the Black Volta Region of Burkina Faso.

Name: Koudougou
Description: Koudougou is the second largest city in the Volta Delta of Burkina Faso.

Name: Ouahigouya
Description: Ouahigouya is a large town in North Burkina Faso, near the Mali border.

Name: W National Park
Description: W National Park [dead link] is in a trans-border park, with the most important areas in  Southwestern Niger.
